profile_data.summary:
Data Scientist at Ebay supporting product and marketing analytics for the Advertisement based product and driving customer satisfaction and revenue opportunities.

Master’s student in Data Analytics from Pennsylvania State University skilled up with technical projects across Reinforcement Learning, Deep Learning and traditional Machine Learning Algorithms. Proficient in EDA and quantitative analysis to drive business insights.

Over 3 years of experience working with a top-tier Digital Payments facilitator where I accumulated sufficient experience of financial data analysis, data visualization, client relationship and new business development. I have good command on data analysis tools, including SQL, Python, R Programming, Tableau and Excel.

CONTACT ME: 484-321-1401 or email me at wahidkhan.abzal@gmail.com
profile_data.headline: Data Scientist | Ebay | Advertising Analytics | Seller Experience | CPC & CPA Charging Models | Improving UX Interfaces

experience.description:
•	Collaborating on research and establishment of a Deep Reinforcement Learning with Double DQN and Actor-Critic Algorithms to build systems to tackle different real-time problems.
•	Established a Smart Kitchen application "An Intelligent voice-based food recommendation system" with LSTM and Neural Collaborative Filtering to provide a personalized list of top 10 recommendations based on similar user preferences and detect the user by their voice sample for easy optimization.
•	Current Finalists in Nittany AI Challenge hosted by Penn State to develop a Deep Learning Solution for end customers: "Gene- & AI-based diagnosis and Medical Cost estimation" incorporating genomic data to deliver 80% accurate prediction and provide users with streamlined estimated medical expenses for better future planning.
•	Credit Default Prediction: Transformed into a binary classification problem developing a walk-through with 12 Machine Learning Algorithms to compare operation and performance and a repository for future reference.
•	Customer segments and sentiment analysis based on geographic demographics to understand customer preference and favorites in different location for food delicacies.
experience.title: Data Scientist - Research Assistant

experience.description:
Post campaign measurements for PayPal – Digital Payment Product
•	Spearheaded the Off-Shore team to analyze the Marketing Campaigns targeted for 7M active customers for a weekly purchase activity synopsis to improve engagement/acquisition (identified a 200% hike in acquisition rate with concentrated targeting). 
•	Developed Tableau and Excel dashboards to visualize Campaign Effectiveness across 12 marketing channels, weekly and monthly campaigns, post enrollments activity of customers, transaction density across channels and consumer segments.
•	Campaign Sizing: Generated the stratified sample (10% Holdout) with the underserved population, clustered the customers characterized by demographics, payment activity into segments for campaign targeting.
•	Earned Encore Award (Top 1% performers in Quarter) and Spirit of LatentView – Teamwork Award

Default Rate Prediction for US based REITs firm (Store Capital) 
•	Collaborated with the New Business Development team to consolidate financial data for 3000 customer firms from balance sheets, financials statements, property finances and risk scores to predict the defaulters of rent (forth-coming quarters) and determine the KPIs influencing the decision.
experience.title: Data Analyst

education.description: Learnt and worked on various mini projects

Working on the build of Autonomous Vehicle as part of the project Elektra. I am responsible for the Vehicle electronics and Automation. The objective is to develop a perception-based self-driving system for urban scenarios.

honors.description: This scholarship is designed to support students who are enrolled in master's degree program offered by the Penn State Great Valley Engineering or Management Divisions who are passionate about starting their own company, leading a start-up company, or taking a leadership position in a rapidly growing new or emerging firm. Scholarship recipients demonstrate innovative thinking and show promise of crafting new solutions to business and society's problems. Award decisions are based on academic merit, entrepreneurial experience, and commitment of the student in his or her chosen field.
honors.title: Warren V. Musser Scholarship

honors.description:
The Chancellor’s Scholarship provides financial assistance to newly enrolling (entering) students at Penn
State Great Valley who have demonstrated excellent academic performance in undergraduate and/or
graduate school and who show future academic promise, as based on information submitted in support of
their admission application, including undergraduate and graduate transcripts, previous work experience,
and standardized test scores (if applicable).
honors.title: Chancellor's Scholarship
